WorkItem.Description: Anhuur's Hymnal (heroic version) doesn't seem to factor its spellpower proc and thus is showing lower overall dps value then the normal version.

Comments.Message: Until next release just add the proc to the item by editing it

Is there somewhere convenient to find out the internal cooldowns and proc chances?  Rawr is usually where I go to find them out, so I don't know where else to look.  The previous build, which I was using up until this morning (Hi Jothay), had the regular Hymnal modeled, but not the Heroic, so I just copied the proc chance and the CD.  This build has neither modeled, and I don't remember the numbers.  In fact, of the four Cata trinkets I own, none of them have their procs modeled.

You can sometimes find info in the Wowhead comments for an item.    For melee trinkets there is some info in the 1st post of this thread on EJ's :-

http://elitistjerks.com/f78/t105429-cataclysm_mechanics_testing/
